palmistry.introduction: Palmistry reveals the story of your life's journey through analyzing the lines and mounts on your palm.

iching.introduction: The ancient I Ching offers deep wisdom through hexagram readings.

horary.introduction: Horary astrology answers specific questions by analyzing the exact moment they are asked.

kabbalistic.introduction: Kabbalah integrates astrology with the mystical teachings of the Tree of Life.

mayan.introduction: Mayan astrology uses sacred calendars and glyphs for spiritual guidance.

celtic.introduction: Celtic astrology connects with nature and the spiritual wisdom of ancestors.
